include(FetchContent)
include(concurrentqueue.cmake)
include(fmt.cmake)
include(google_test.cmake)
include(pybind11.cmake)
include(spdlog.cmake)
# if BUILD_BY is defined, and its ARM
if(NOT DEFINED NO_COROUTINE OR NOT NO_COROUTINE)
    include(libcoro.cmake)
else()
    message(STATUS "Coroutine support disabled")
endif()
